name: zoom
desc: Sets the styling for the graph's zoom object, which is the selection box that appears when a user clicks and drags to select the zoom area. Zooming must be enabled by setting 'zooming':true within scale-x and/or scale-y.

attrs.name: preserve-zoompreserveZoom
attrs.desc: Sets whether the zoom level is being preseved on chart data alteration or reloads.

attrs.name: shared
attrs.desc: Sets whether zoom will be applied to charts together or individually.

attrs.name: alpha
attrs.desc: Sets the transparency of the object. Values must range between 0.0 and 1.0, with 0.0 being completely invisible and 1.0 being completely opaque. Please note that values also require the leading 0 before the decimal.

attrs.name: background-colorbackgroundColor
attrs.desc: Sets the background color of the object.  Colors can be entered by name (e.g. "red", "blue", "yellow"), in hexadecimal notation (e.g. "#FF0000", "#0000FF", "#FFFF00"), or in RGB notation (e.g. "rgb(255,0,0)", "rgb(0,0,255)", "rgb(255,255,0)").  One color will set a solid background color, two colors will, by default, create a horizontal gradient.  For more complex gradients, use gradient-colors and gradient-stops.

attrs.name: border-colorborderColor
attrs.desc: Sets the border color of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-color for closed shapes.

attrs.name: border-widthborderWidth
attrs.desc: Sets the border width of the object, applicable on closed shapes. See also line-width for closed shapes.
